article.title: Camp Roberts to Get New Satellite Communications Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: WATTS/WEBCOR, J.V., Honolulu, Hawaii, was awarded a $34,801,408 firm-fixed-price contract for the construction of a satellite communications operations center, an administration support center, and a repair and utilities building at Camp Roberts, California. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Sacramento, California, is the contracting activity.
